verses.verse: Wherefore, <S%G3606><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> partakers <S%G3353><s%> of the heavenly <S%G2032><s%> calling, <S%G2821><s%> consider <S%G2657><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Apostle <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> High Priest <S%G749><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> profession, <S%G3671><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus; <S%G2424><s%>

Who was <S%G5607><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> to him that appointed <S%G4160><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> was faithful in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house. <S%G3624><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man was counted worthy <S%G515><s%> of more <S%G4119><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> Moses, <S%G3475><s%> inasmuch <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3745><s%> as he who hath builded <S%G2680><s%> the house <S%G846><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> than the <S%G3588><s%> house. <S%G3624><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> is builded <S%G2680><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> man; but <S%G1161><s%> he that built <S%G2680><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> is God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> verily <S%G3303><s%> was faithful <S%G4103><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house, <S%G3624><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a servant, <S%G2324><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> a testimony <S%G3142><s%> of those things which were to be spoken after; <S%G2980><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a son <S%G5207><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> his own <S%G848><s%> house; <S%G3624><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> are <S%G2070><s%> we, <S%G2249><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> <S%G4007><s%> we hold fast <S%G2722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> confidence <S%G3954><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> rejoicing <S%G2745><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> firm <S%G949><s%> unto <S%G3360><s%> the end. <S%G5056><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> (as <S%G2531><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> saith, <S%G3004><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> ye will hear <S%G191><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%>

Harden <S%G4645><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> provocation, <S%G3894><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of temptation <S%G3986><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wilderness: <S%G2048><s%>

When <S%G3757><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> tempted <S%G3985><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> proved <S%G1381><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I was grieved <S%G4360><s%> with that <S%G1565><s%> generation, <S%G1074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> They do always <S%G104><s%> err <S%G4105><s%> in their heart; <S%G2588><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G846><s%> have not <S%G3756><s%> known <S%G1097><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> ways. <S%G3598><s%>
So <S%G5613><s%> I swore <S%G3660><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> wrath, <S%G3709><s%> They <S%G1487><s%> shall not enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> rest.) <S%G2663><s%>

Take heed, <S%G991><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> there be <S%G2071><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> an evil <S%G4190><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> of unbelief, <S%G570><s%> in departing <S%G868><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> exhort <S%G3870><s%> one another <S%G1438><s%> daily, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1538><s%> <S%G2250><s%> while <S%G891><s%> <S%G3757><s%> it <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> Today; <S%G4594><s%> lest <S%G3363><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> be hardened <S%G4645><s%> through the deceitfulness <S%G539><s%> of sin. <S%G266><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we are made <S%G1096><s%> partakers <S%G3353><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> <S%G4007><s%> we hold <S%G2722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> beginning <S%G746><s%> of our confidence <S%G5287><s%> steadfast <S%G949><s%> unto <S%G3360><s%> the end; <S%G5056><s%>

While it is said, <S%G3004><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> ye will hear <S%G191><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> harden <S%G4645><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> provocation. <S%G3894><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> some, <S%G5100><s%> when they had heard, <S%G191><s%> did provoke: <S%G3893><s%> howbeit <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that came <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> Egypt <S%G125><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> Moses. <S%G3475><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> with whom <S%G5101><s%> was he grieved <S%G4360><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> years? <S%G2094><s%> was it not <S%G3780><s%> with them that had sinned, <S%G264><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> carcasses <S%G2966><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wilderness? <S%G2048><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> to whom <S%G5101><s%> swore <S%G3660><s%> he that they should not <S%G3361><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G848><s%> rest, <S%G2663><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> to them that believed not? <S%G544><s%>
So <S%G2532><s%> we see <S%G991><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they could <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> enter in <S%G1525><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of unbelief. <S%G570><s%>
